definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: eminence; of towering horns (? v. Di) [[כְּתוֹעֲפׂת רְאֵם לוֹ]] Nu 23:22, Nu 24:8, sim. of strength of Israel; of peaks [[תּוֹעֲפוֹת הָרִים לוֹ]] Ps 95:4 (‖[[מֶחְקְרֵי־אָָרֶץ]]); of silver Job 22:25 [[כֶּסֶף]] [[תּוֹעָפוֹת לָָךְ]], very dubious, perhaps heaps or bars (ingots).
